game.name: Jaden Williams' The Stalking Stairs
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A city under curfew. A killer on the loose. You’re a delivery driver racing to finish your last run before 9 PM in a decaying apartment complex where every knock could be your last, in this PSX-style psychological horror.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A city under curfew. A killer on the loose. You’re a delivery driver racing to finish your last run before 9 PM in a decaying apartment complex where every knock could be your last, in this PSX-style psychological horror.
